champ_0110_rival_01:
You remember how it all works, right? Once you
get badges from all the Gyms...[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_rival_02:
you get to throw down against the strongest
Pokémon Trainers around![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_chairman_01: Yes. You must face the Pokémon League.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0110_chairman_02: It is located to the northwest of Mesagoza.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0110_chairman_03:
The Pokémon League is where Trainers are
reborn as Champions—the greatest honor that\r
they might dream of.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0110_rival_03:
Collecting eight Gym Badges sets you up to
take the Champion Assessment.[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_rival_04:
If you can face the challenge of the final
examiner and win, you’ll become a Champion![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_rival_19:
Just imagine how that moment would feel.
Try getting into that Champion mindset![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_rival_05:
Now, set your sights on reaching that big,
important stage...and let’s battl—[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_chairman_05:
[VAR BD06(0000)]I believe [VAR TRNAME(0000)]’s
Pokémon\r
may\r
still\r
be\r
a\r
little\r
fatigued.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0110_rival_06: Sorry! Got a little caught up in my battle hunger.[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_rival_07:
Well, you should all be in great shape now thanks
to La Primera![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_rival_08:
[VAR BD06(0000)]OK, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. Time to put
our\r
game\r
faces\r
back on![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_rival_09: Let’s have us another fruitful battle![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_chairman_06:
An amazing display of talent, even against one
as skilled as Champion Nemona.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0110_chairman_07:
That was a splendid match. I enjoyed watching
very much.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0110_rival_10:
Now even La Primera thinks you’re one to watch.
You’ve got so much potential![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_rival_11: The way you’re going, I better watch my back![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_rival_12:
Did battling in front of La Primera give you the
jitters, maybe?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_rival_13:
Well, I might’ve won, but it was obvious how
much you’ve bonded with your Pokémon![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_rival_14:
Y’know, since the first time we met, I’ve been
weirdly sure of one thing...[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_rival_15:
You’re gonna become a Champion—no doubt
about it, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_rival_16:
The rest of these Gyms? You can take ’em!
Hundred percent, no problem![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_chairman_08:
I agree. In fact, you should take this. Consider it
an investment in your future.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0110_chairman_12:
If a Pokémon uses that move while Terastallized,
the move’s type will change to the Tera Type\r
of the Pokémon.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0110_rival_17:
[VAR BD06(0000)]One day, [VAR TRNAME(0000)], you and
me\r
are\r
gonna\r
have\r
the\r
greatest\r
battle\r
of\r
all!\r
I know it![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_rival_18:
I’m gonna go train up—even more than I already
have been![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0110_chairman_09:
She shows you such support and friendship.
Or perhaps...\c
Perhaps she hopes you truly might rival her?[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0110_chairman_10:
No... I think it’s no mere hope. She seems to have
complete faith that you will catch up to her.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0110_chairman_11:
At any rate, allow me to return you to the Gym
where I found you.[VAR 0114(0011)]
